verbose_text: We also demonstrate that the depletion of Asc from permissive macrophages enhances bacterial growth by promoting L. pneumophila mediated activation of the NF-kappaB pathway and decreasing caspase-3 activation.
evidence: Asc from permissive macrophages enhances bacterial growth by promoting L. pneumophila-mediated activation of the NF-kappaB pathway and decreasing caspase-3
